<manifest android:installLocation="auto"> <supports-screens android:anyDensity="true" android:largeScreens="true" android:normalScreens="true" android:smallScreens="true" />
<!-- 读取设备信息 --> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE" /> <!-- 往sdcard中写入数据的权限 --> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> <!-- 在sdcard中创建/删除文件的权限 --> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYSTEMS" /> <!-- 网络连接 --> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE" /> <!-- 读取验证码 --> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_SMS"/> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS" /> <!-- 微信支付 begin --> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.VIBRATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.webkit.permission.PLUGIN" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE" /> <!-- 微信支付 end-->
<uses-sdk android:minSdkVersion="8" android:targetSdkVersion="21" />
<application android:allowBackup="true" >
<!-- 登录 --> <activity android:name="com.jolo.account.activity.LoginActivity" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|locale|mcc|mnc" > </activity> <!-- 登录账号选项 --> <activity android:name="com.jolo.account.activity.LoginOptionActivity" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|locale|mcc|mnc" > </activity>
<!-- 注册选项 --> <activity android:name="com.jolo.account.activity.RegisterOptionActivity" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|locale|mcc|mnc" />
<!-- 注册 --> <activity android:name="com.jolo.account.activity.NormalRegisterActivity" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|locale|mcc|mnc" />
<!-- 手机注册 --> <activity android:name="com.jolo.account.activity.RegisterPhoneActivity" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|locale|mcc|mnc" />
<!-- 绑定手机 --> <activity android:name="com.jolo.account.activity.BindPhoneActivity" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|locale|mcc|mnc" /> <!-- 注册协议 --> <activity android:name="com.jolo.account.activity.ProtocolActivity" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|locale|mcc|mnc" />
<!-- 修改密码 --> <activity android:name="com.jolo.account.activity.ModifyPwdActivity" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|locale|mcc|mnc" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateAlwaysVisible" />
<!-- 支付界面 Begin -->
<activity android:name="com.jolo.jolopay.JoloPayActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|screenSize|keyboardHidden|navigation|orientation" android:exported="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.NoTitle" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden" > </activity>
<activity android:name="com.jolo.jolopay.JoloRechargeActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|navigation|orientation|screenSize" android:theme="@style/Theme.NoTitle" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden" > </activity>
<activity android:name="com.unionpay.uppay.PayActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|screenSize|keyboardHidden|screenLayout" android:excludeFromRecents="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.NoTitle" > </activity>
<activity android:name="com.alipay.sdk.app.H5PayActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|navigation" android:exported="false" android:screenOrientation="behind" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustResize|stateHidden" > </activity>
<activity android:name="com.ipaynow.plugin.activity.PayMethodActivity" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Dialog" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden" android:exported="false" android:screenOrientation="portrait"> </activity> <!-- 微信支付注意：配置 android:configChanges="orientation|screenSize"--> <activity android:name="com.ipaynow.plugin.inner_plugin.wechat_plugin.activity.WeChatNotifyActivity" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.NoDisplay" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden" android:configChanges="orientation|screenSize"> </activity>
<!-- 支付界面 End --> <!-- HTC SDK 渠道号定义 --> <meta-data android:name="HTC_CHANNEL" android:value="htc" />
